title: 2021 IHF Men's Super Globe
description: ‌The 2021 IHF Men's Super Globe will be 14th edition of the yearly club world championship in handball scheduled to be held from 5 to 9 October 2021 at Jeddah, Saudi Arabia under the aegis of International Handball Federation (IHF). It will be the second time in history that the event will be organised by the Saudi Arabian Handball Federation.
